column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We had the red sangria
column2: that was delicious! And we ordered the steak and blue cheese
column3: the grilled octopus and the potato omelet. The steak and octopus were outstanding
column4: the omelet was a bit dry... wouldn't order it again.. For dessert (also in small tapas size) we had the almond caramel bar and the chocolate truffle cake
